sections.text: boycott; unlawful.It shall be unlawful for any person to engage in a secondary boycott as herein defined, notwithstanding the provisions of any contract to the contrary;Provided,that nothing herein shall prevent sympathetic strikes in support of those in similar occupations working for other employers in the same craft.SourceLaws 1959, c. 231, ยง 3, p. 809.

48-903.Secondary boycott; unlawful.

It shall be unlawful for any person to engage in a secondary boycott as herein defined, notwithstanding the provisions of any contract to the contrary;Provided,that nothing herein shall prevent sympathetic strikes in support of those in similar occupations working for other employers in the same craft.

SourceLaws 1959, c. 231, ยง 3, p. 809.
